sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.USAGE_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,NVL(T1.PREV_MT_USAGE_QY, 0) AS PREV_MT_USAGE_QY ,NVL(T1.SAID_MT_USAGE_QY, 0) AS SAID_MT_USAGE_QY ,NVL(T1.APPLC_COEF, 0) AS APPLC_COEF ,NVL(T1.NET_USAGE_QY, 0) AS NET_USAGE_QY ,T1.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,SUBSTRB(T1.USAGE_MT,1,4) AS USAGE_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.USAGE_MT,5,2) AS USAGE_MT_MON ,SUBSTRB(T1.USAGE_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.USAGE_MT,5,2) AS USAGE_YR_MT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM FROM ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.USAGE_MT = #sUsageYear# || #sUsageMt#
AND T1.USAGE_MT LIKE #sUsageYear# || '%'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #sMngFeeFcltyCd#
ORDER BY T1.USAGE_MT, T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F WHERE 1=1
AND USAGE_MT = #sUsageYear# || #sUsageMt#
AND USAGE_MT LIKE #sUsageYear# || '%'
AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #sMngFeeFcltyCd#

SELECT /*+ INDEX (T2 PK_ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F) */ T1.MT ,NVL(SUM(T2.SAID_MT_USAGE_QY),0) AS SAID_MT_USAGE_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.NET_USAGE_QY),0) AS NET_USAGE_QY FROM ( SELECT #mngFeeFcltyCd# AS MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,#mngFeeJobSe# AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,#usageMtYear# || LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS USAGE_MT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD=T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.USAGE_MT=T2.USAGE_MT) GROUP BY T1.MT ORDER BY T1.MT

SELECT SAID_MT_USAGE_QY FROM ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F WHERE USAGE_MT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#usageMtYear# || #usageMtMon#, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS MT_CNT ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sUsageYear# || #sUsageMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AS PREV_MT FROM ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F WHERE MNG_MT = #sUsageYear# || #sUsageMt#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F SET PREV_MT_USAGE_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prevMtUsageQy#,',','')) ,SAID_MT_USAGE_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#saidMtUsageQy#,',','')) ,APPLC_COEF = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#applcCoef#,',','')) ,NET_USAGE_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#netUsageQy#,',','')) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USAGE_MT = #usageMtYear# || #usageMtMon# AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F WHERE USAGE_MT = #usageMtYear# || #usageMtMon# AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F ( USAGE_MT ,MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,PREV_MT_USAGE_QY ,SAID_MT_USAGE_QY ,APPLC_COEF ,NET_USAGE_QY ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) SELECT #sUsageYear# || #sUsageMt# ,MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,NVL(SAID_MT_USAGE_QY,0) ,NVL(SAID_MT_USAGE_QY,0) + (NVL(SAID_MT_USAGE_QY,0) - NVL(PREV_MT_USAGE_QY,0)) ,APPLC_COEF ,NET_USAGE_QY ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F WHERE USAGE_MT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sUsageYear# || #sUsageMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')
